response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both parties, with a total worth of $1,200,000. I understand its significance to you and am confident it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors.

To facilitate this transaction and ensure it meets your expectations, I am offering you the chance to purchase the product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving of $100,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you choose to proceed, I assure you of a seamless and professional service throughout the entire process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
